mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN CGROUP_REL CGR ON CGR.CID=C.CID LEFT JOIN CGROUP CG ON CG.ID=CGR.CGROUP_ID where C.CID = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN CGROUP_REL CGR ON CGR.CID=C.CID LEFT JOIN CGROUP CG ON CG.ID=CGR.CGROUP_ID where C.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID from CUSTOMER where MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
